title: Aoi Haru, Akai Ito
sinopse: Yuuki is an honor student who comes from a prominent family and carries his family name. His strict father is forcing him to become a doctor like him. As a result, Yuuki is tired of constantly being controlled by his father and of life without freedom. He has absolutely no attachments in his life and starts sleeping with strangers. One night a man starts to get rough with Yuuki so he ran away and accidentally bumped into Asahi, a prodigy actor of the wandering troupe who will change his life.
